questions.quote: You know what you ought to do George? You should work for Greenpeace. You those people they attack the whalers out on the open sea.
-programs like Ken Burns' Baseball. And if Danny Tartabull were here, I'm sure he'd say, 'That's correct, Jerry.'
They don't actually have to squeeze his head to get him to say 'holy cow', do they?
Um, excuse me, have you see a guy with like a horse face, big teeth, and a, and a pointed nose?
We did a crossword puzzle together, *in bed*. It was the most fun I ever had in my entire life. Did you hear me? in my *life*! Y'know?
No he couldn't, because the other car was already backing in.
Well, I better get going. I don't want to be late for the play.
Hey, you should see the Berkhardt, Jerry. My mile is spotless. I mean the big stuff was easy. Cinderblocks, air-conditioners, shopping carts , I just rolled 'em into the woods.
Well, it just didn't seem to be the right project for us right now.  So, what were you saying?
It's Risk, Jerry.  The game of world conquest.   Alright, that's perfect.
